## Checklist

- [ ] Parent hub identified
- [ ] No new tools registered (spokes inherit only)
- [ ] No direct external calls
- [ ] Failures propagate to hub
- [ ] Hub owner approved
- [ ] Failure codes added to PRD
- [ ] Master Failure Log integration
